headline: Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL) Reports Strong Q3 Growth and Revises 2024 Outlook
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Consumer Stocks to Buy for a Retirement Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) stands against other consumer stocks to buy for a retirement stock portfolio.
